title: SpaceX launches Starlink satellites to higher orbit
summary: SpaceX launched a set of Starlink satellites Feb. 21 after more than three-fourths of the satellites from the previous launch were lost because of a solar storm.

title: Northrop Grumman delivers cargo and new reboost capability to space station
summary: A commercial Cygnus cargo freighter from Northrop Grumman arrived at the International Space Station Monday, delivering more than 8,000 pounds of supplies and a new U.S. capability to reboost the altitude of the complex independent of Russian rocket thrusters.

title: SpaceX Falcon 9 booster aces eleventh launch and landing for the second time
summary: For the second time, a SpaceX Falcon 9 booster has completed its eleventh launch, spaceflight, and landing – helping deliver dozens of...

title: SpaceX adds 46 more satellites to Starlink fleet
summary: SpaceX launched a Falcon 9 rocket Monday from Cape Canaveral with 46 more satellites for the company’s Starlink broadband network, deploying the internet relay payloads in a higher orbit than recent flights after atmospheric drag brought down more nearly 40 Starlink spacecraft from the previous mission.

title: Northrop Grumman to launch new satellite-servicing mission in 2024
summary: Space Logistics, a satellite-servicing firm owned by Northrop Grumman, announced Feb. 21 it plans to send to orbit a new servicing vehicle in 2024 on a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket.
